command_name_provide: You must provide a command name, without the prefix.
command_permission: You are not allowed to execute this command as you do not have the permission "%s".
command_unavailable_developer: You are not allowed to execute this command as you are not a developer.
command_unavailable_embed: Commands are currently unavailable as the bot needs permission to embed.
command_subcommand_unknown: A sub command with that name does not exist.
commands_commands_disable_developer: I cannot disable this command as it is a developer command.
commands_commands_disable_commands: I cannot disable this command as it would cause issues, silly.
commands_commands_embed_main_value:
`{prefix}commands list [page number]`
- Lists all (except hidden/developer) commands.

`{prefix}commands info <command name>`
- Shows information about a command.

`{prefix}commands enable <command name>`
- Enables a command.

`{prefix}commands disable <command name>`
- Disables a command.

`{prefix}custom`
- Manages custom commands.
commands_commands_info_description: Digging through the NSA's files has revealed the following information for the specified command:
commands_commands_list_description: Here is a list of all commands. Use {prefix}commands list [page number] to navigate.
commands_custom_embed_description:
Here is a list of commands for custom command management.
For more information please visit the wiki.
commands_custom_embed_value:
`{prefix}custom create <name>`
- Creates a custom command with the name <name>.

`{prefix}custom delete <name>`
- Deletes the custom command with the name <name>,

`{prefix}custom settype <name> <type>`
- Sets the command type for <name>.

`{prefix}custom setsyntax <name> <syntax>`
- Sets the syntax for <name>.

`{prefix}custom setperm <name> <permission>`
- Sets the permission for <name>.

`{prefix}custom setdescription <name> <description>`
- Sets the command description for <name>.

`{prefix}custom setvalue <name> <value>`
- Sets the value for <name>.

`{prefix}custom list [page number]`
- Lists all custom commands.

`{prefix}custom export <name>`
- Export custom command <name>.

`{prefix}custom import <link>`
- Import a custom command.
commands_eval_code_provide: Please provide the code to evaluate.
commands_eval_description: Evaluates code in the provided engine.
commands_eval_engine_invalid: The engine provided does not exist. Available engines: %s.
commands_eval_engine_provide: Please provide the engine to use.
commands_help_embed_description:
Hey there! Let me introduce myself: I am Arraybot. I am an elite toolbox developed to power your guild. Unlike other bots, I am designed to be extremely flexible, easy to use, and efficient. With features ranging from one of the best custom command systems in Discord to admirable punishment utils and customizable languages, I am able to reliably power your guild.
{zwsp}
commands_help_embed_help_value:
Here are some help links:
- [Join my support guild](http://invite.arraybot.xyz)
- [Check out my wiki]({github}wiki)
{zwsp}
commands_ping_ping: Currently running with a latency of %s milliseconds.
commands_reload_embed_description: Here are a list of reload commands.
commands_reload_embed_value:
`{prefix}reload languages`
- Reloads the language files to include edits. Will block all messages momentarily.

`{prefix}reload shards <shard|all>`
- Reloads a specific shard or all shards.`
commands_reload_shard_invalid: The shard ID provided is invalid. Must be and integer (%s to %s) or "all".
commands_script_description: Evaluates the given Zeus script link.
commands_script_error_link: The link you have provided is not a valid raw Pastebin link (e.g. <https://pastebin.com/raw/hi1337>).
commands_shards_embed_description: Here are a list of shards. You can navigate pages using {prefix}shards <page number>.
custom_argument_provide: You must provide an argument, proper usage: {prefix}%s%s.
custom_permission: You do not have permission to execute this command.
custom_syntax_invalid: The custom command syntax specified does not exist.
custom_type_invalid: The custom command type specified does not exist.
custom_type_implemented: This type is not yet implemented, but coming soon.
custom_type_role_added: I have given you the role.
custom_type_role_removed: I have removed that role from you.
custom_type_role_unknown_role: I could not execute this action since the provided role ID was invalid.
custom_type_role_unknown_user: I could not execute this action since the provided user ID was invalid.
custom_type_role_permission: I could not execute this action because I do not have permission (generally or for that user).
custom_value_empty: The custom command value may not be empty.
punish_embed_expiration_footer: The times should be relative to the guild's voice region, not your Discord client.
zeus_error_arguments_index: An argument with that index does not exist (using zero based indexing).
zeus_error_ban_reason_length: The ban reason exceeds the maximum length (%s).
zeus_error_channel_name_length: The channel name must be between %s and %s characters.
zeus_error_channel_nsfw_type: The channel NSFW value must be of the variable type boolean.
zeus_error_channel_position_type: The channel position must be of variable type integer.
zeus_error_channel_topic_length: The channel topic can only be up to %s characters.
zeus_error_nickname_length: The nickname must be between %s and %s characters.
zeus_error_nickname_permission: I do not have permission to change that/any person's nickname.
zeus_error_message_pin_boolean: Required a boolean for the new message value.
zeus_error_message_pin_permission: I do not have permission to pin the message.
